(:action breathe ;  Perform a breathing action to change the state of the entity
    :parameters (?entity - agent)
    :precondition (and (calm ?entity) (lungs_empty ?entity))
    :effect (and (buoyant ?entity) (lungs_full ?entity) (not (lungs_empty ?entity))

(:action identify ; Identify an entity and update its status
    :parameters (?entity - object)
    :precondition (and (unidentified ?entity))
    :effect (and (identified ?entity) (not (unidentified ?entity))

(:action mark ; Mark a target with a resource to indicate a state change
    :parameters (?agent - entity ?target - object ?resource - object)
    :precondition (and (identified ?target) (available ?resource))
    :effect (and (marked ?target ?resource) (not (available ?resource))

(:action create ; Create a defined entity from an undefined state
  :parameters (?creator - agent ?entity - object ?condition - condition)
  :precondition (and (marked ?condition ?creator) (undefined ?entity))
  :effect (and (defined ?entity) (satisfies ?entity ?condition) (not (undefined ?entity))

(:action guide ; Guide an entity to avoid identified hazards or obstacles
  :parameters (?area - location ?entity - person ?hazard - condition)
  :precondition (and (identified ?area ?hazard) (unaware ?entity))
  :effect (and (aware ?entity) (avoiding ?entity ?area) (not (unaware ?entity))
